quiz.title: Economics: Equilibrium, Elasticity, and Normative Analysis

questions.question: A decrease in demand causes the equilibrium price to ________.
questions.explanation: A decrease in demand shifts the demand curve leftward, leading to a lower equilibrium price (assuming supply remains unchanged).

questions.question: The price of a product falls by 10% and its demand rises by 30%. The elasticity of demand is:
questions.explanation: Price elasticity of demand = percentage change in quantity demanded / percentage change in price = 30% / 10% = 3.

questions.question: Identify the aspect of taxation which is related to normative economics:
options: Effect of tax on the willingness to work
questions.explanation: Normative economics deals with value judgments (what ought to be). Equity of tax involves fairness judgments, which are normative.
